comments.listen_port: port for node to listen on (can also be a file path to listen on a unix socket)
comments.prefix: prefix for urls of files being served. use https if behind SSL proxy
comments.suffix: use ':<port>' if node or proxy is on nonstandard port
comments.loglevel: use 'warn' to make the server quieter
comments.serve_dir: path of directory to serve.  server defaults to process.cwd()
